item.title: Introduction to ArgParse
item.description: This is an example of AsciiDoc File. Toto Tito Line numbers is (so far) only supported by asciidoc-pdf when using rouge. See Issue #224 for details. You can force the usage of rouge with following option in command line: -a source-highlighter=rouge test.py 10class ExprParser(): 11 """To parse expressions""" 12 def __init__(self, obj, parse_children=False): 13 self.expressions = self.
